Package io.github.olyutorskii.jarabradix

JarabraDix is a integer value to Arabic decimal sequence converter.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArabicEncoder
    Convert integer value to Arabic-decimal character sequence.
    DecimalSequence
    Decimal character sequence.
    DecimalWriter
    Writer for integer(int and long) value printing.

Package io.github.olyutorskii.jarabradix Description

JarabraDix is a integer value to Arabic decimal sequence converter.

It's similar to Integer.toString(int) and PrintWriter.print(int). But, ther is no String constructor happen. It's mean, GC-friendly.
